verses.text: Be not thou \w envious|strong="H7065"\w* against \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, neither \w desire|strong="H0183"\w* to be with them.
For their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w studieth|strong="H1897"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7701"\w*, and their \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w talk|strong="H1696"\w* of \w mischief|strong="H5999"\w*.
Through \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* is an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w builded|strong="H1129"\w*; and by \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* it is \w established|strong="H3559"\w*:

And by \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* shall the \w chambers|strong="H2315"\w* be \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with all \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* and \w pleasant|strong="H5273"\w* \w riches|strong="H1952"\w*.

A \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \add is\add* \w strong|strong="H5797"\w*; yea, a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w increaseth|strong="H0553"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*.\f + \fr 24.5 \ft is strong: Heb. is in strength\f*\f + \fr 24.5 \ft increaseth…: Heb. strengtheneth might\f*

For by wise \w counsel|strong="H8458"\w* thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* thy \w war|strong="H4421"\w*: and in \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of \w counsellors|strong="H3289"\w* \add there is\add* \w safety|strong="H8668"\w*.

\w Wisdom|strong="H2454"\w* \add is\add* too \w high|strong="H7311"\w* for a \w fool|strong="H0191"\w*: he \w openeth|strong="H6605"\w* not his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* in the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*.
He that \w deviseth|strong="H2803"\w* to do \w evil|strong="H7489"\w* shall be \w called|strong="H7121"\w* a \w mischievous|strong="H4209"\w* \w person|strong="H1167"\w*.

The \w thought|strong="H2154"\w* of \w foolishness|strong="H0200"\w* \add is\add* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*: and the \w scorner|strong="H3887"\w* \add is\add* an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* to \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.

\add If\add* thou \w faint|strong="H7503"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w adversity|strong="H6869"\w*, thy \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \add is\add* \w small|strong="H6862"\w*.\f + \fr 24.10 \ft small: Heb. narrow\f*

If thou \w forbear|strong="H2820"\w* to \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \add them that are\add* \w drawn|strong="H3947"\w* unto \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, and \add those that are\add* \w ready|strong="H4131"\w* to be \w slain|strong="H2027"\w*;

If thou \w sayest|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, we \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* it not; doth not he that \w pondereth|strong="H8505"\w* the \w heart|strong="H3826"\w* \w consider|strong="H0995"\w* \add it\add*? and he that \w keepeth|strong="H5341"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, doth \add not\add* he \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \add it\add*? and shall \add not\add* he \w render|strong="H7725"\w* to \add every\add* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* according to his \w works|strong="H6467"\w*?

My \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thou \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, because \add it is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; and the \w honeycomb|strong="H5317"\w*, \add which is\add* \w sweet|strong="H4966"\w* to thy \w taste|strong="H2441"\w*:\f + \fr 24.13 \ft to…: Heb. upon thy palate\f*

So \add shall\add* the \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \add be\add* unto thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: when thou hast \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \add it\add*, then there shall \w be|strong="H3426"\w* a \w reward|strong="H0319"\w*, and thy \w expectation|strong="H8615"\w* shall not be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.

Lay not \w wait|strong="H0693"\w*, O \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add man\add*, against the \w dwelling|strong="H5116"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*; \w spoil|strong="H7703"\w* not his resting \w place|strong="H7258"\w*:

For a \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \add man\add* \w falleth|strong="H5307"\w* seven \w times|strong="H7651"\w*, and riseth up \w again|strong="H6965"\w*: but the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H3782"\w* into \w mischief|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w Rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* not when thine \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* \w falleth|strong="H5307"\w*, and let not thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* be \w glad|strong="H1523"\w* when he \w stumbleth|strong="H3782"\w*:

Lest the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, and it \w displease|strong="H7489"\w* him, and he turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* his \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* from him.\f + \fr 24.18 \ft it displease…: Heb. it be evil in his eyes\f*

\w Fret|strong="H2734"\w* not thyself because of \w evil|strong="H7489"\w* \add men\add*, neither be thou \w envious|strong="H7065"\w* at the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*;\f + \fr 24.19 \ft Fret…: or, Keep not company with the wicked\f*

For there shall be no \w reward|strong="H0319"\w* to the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \add man;\add* the \w candle|strong="H5216"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall be put \w out|strong="H1846"\w*.\f + \fr 24.20 \ft candle: or, lamp\f*

My \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thou the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \add and\add* \w meddle|strong="H6148"\w* not with them that are given to \w change|strong="H8138"\w*:\f + \fr 24.21 \ft them…: Heb. changers\f*

For their \w calamity|strong="H0343"\w* shall \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w*; and who \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* the \w ruin|strong="H6365"\w* of them \w both|strong="H8147"\w*?

These \add things\add* also \add belong\add* to the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*. \add It is\add* not \w good|strong="H2896"\w* to have \w respect|strong="H5234"\w* of \w persons|strong="H6440"\w* in \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

He that \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, Thou \add art\add* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*; him shall the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w curse|strong="H5344"\w*, \w nations|strong="H3816"\w* shall \w abhor|strong="H2194"\w* him:

But to them that \w rebuke|strong="H3198"\w* \add him\add* shall be \w delight|strong="H5276"\w*, and a \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon them.\f + \fr 24.25 \ft a good…: Heb. a blessing of good\f*

\add Every man\add* shall \w kiss|strong="H5401"\w* \add his\add* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* that \w giveth|strong="H7725"\w* a \w right|strong="H5228"\w* \w answer|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 24.26 \ft that…: Heb. that answereth right words\f*

\w Prepare|strong="H3559"\w* thy \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w*, and make it \w fit|strong="H6257"\w* for thyself in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*; and \w afterwards|strong="H0310"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.
Be not a \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* against thy \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* without \w cause|strong="H2600"\w*; and \w deceive|strong="H6601"\w* \add not\add* with thy \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*.

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* not, I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* so to him as he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to me: I will \w render|strong="H7725"\w* to the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* according to his \w work|strong="H6467"\w*.

I \w went|strong="H5674"\w* by the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* of the \w slothful|strong="H0376"\w*, and by the \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* of the \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w void|strong="H2638"\w* of \w understanding|strong="H3820"\w*;

And, lo, it was all grown \w over|strong="H5927"\w* with \w thorns|strong="H7063"\w*, \add and\add* \w nettles|strong="H2738"\w* had \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* thereof, and the \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \w wall|strong="H1444"\w* thereof was broken \w down|strong="H2040"\w*.

Then I \w saw|strong="H2372"\w*, \add and\add* considered \add it\add* \w well|strong="H7896"\w*: I \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* upon \add it, and\add* \w received|strong="H3947"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*.\f + \fr 24.32 \ft considered…: Heb. set my heart\f*

\add Yet\add* a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*, a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w slumber|strong="H8572"\w*, a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w folding|strong="H2264"\w* of the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* to \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w*:

So shall thy \w poverty|strong="H7389"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \add as\add* one that \w travelleth|strong="H1980"\w*; and thy \w want|strong="H4270"\w* as an \w armed|strong="H4043"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.\f + \fr 24.34 \ft an…: Heb. a man of shield\f*
